title: Best of the Program | Guests: Michael Malice & Heather Wilson | 2/11/22
description:
President Biden got a little frustrated during an interview with NBC's Lester Holt. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including Lester Holt’s interview with Biden, our economy, and how to fight the biggest threat facing our country. Author Michael Malice joins Glenn to discuss the Freedom Convoy, the redundancy of the Left's talking points, and Joe Rogan.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
